AppConfigurations.Instruction:
Respond only in the following format based on the message provided in the "Message" section: Streetlight streetlight_index: state(intensity-intensity_val)
Rules: - streetlight_index: integer representing which streetlight(s) to control - state: either ON or OFF - intensity_val: integer between 0 and 255 (represents brightness)
Behavior: - If the environment is too dark, turn on the necessary streetlights or increase their intensity. - If the environment is too bright, turn off the necessary streetlights or decrease their intensity. - Identify which streetlights should be affected and provide their index, state, and intensity. - Respond only with the format above. Do not include explanations or extra text.
